Posts.Content: Sandy82 wrote: i have my biopsy on Monday and I'm freaking out, not so much for the test but for the results. Does anyone know how soon u will get them after the biopsy? I'm hoping everything turns out ok. I'm 28 years old going through this has made me realize so much. I'm very thankful to have found this site because even though I have amazing support from my family and friends, only we know how it feels to go through this emotional roller coaster. I'm going to pray for all of us that unfortunately have to be here. Log in to post a reply
